website_summaries.verdict: Paternity test for the budget-focused buyers in mind – look out for the waiting time.
pros: The FDA approval of the test makes it a value for money when you pair it with the price
The test is accurate and results can be emailed for privacy
cons: Results take up to 5 days, which is longer compared to other tests

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS TEST. RESEARCH MORE REVIEWS. I ordered this to get a DNA test with my father and it came back 0% paternity. I called the company 6 times with no call back and no refund. 2 other DNA tests prove he is my father. Do not put yourself through that heartache!!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Currently a 1 star, but will change it if ...
customer_reviews.text: Currently a 1 star, but will change it if I ever hear back from someone and everything runs smooth. I never got notification that anything has been received. After 5 days, it now says the website is down and that I'll receive an email. I have emailed the email address on the card and waiting on a response. Currently on day 8 without a response or results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a total scam!!  Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Sent in the packet and says within 5 days you can go to website for results. When we did that, it says website was down and we would be notified by e-mail. Never happened and no one to contact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed and heartbroken
customer_reviews.text: It's been 2 months I've called several times and still dont have my results . Starting to feel like I got scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi J.

customer_reviews.title: Not as promised
customer_reviews.text: The site says 5-7 processing days and I have been waiting. Ore than 20. If you're looking for quick results don't use this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Frye

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Once mailed in and time it took to finish was 9days. 3 were weekend days and one was a Holiday. So it took them 5 days to complete. As progress was made they would generate an update.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Mama's baby papa's maybe.
customer_reviews.text: This Paternity test was a Godsend. My nephew found out in January of 2019, after 3 years that the child we all fell in love with was not his. My nephew who was a great father to this child, and had not been with the child's mother since the birth. My nephew is now going to court to have his name removed from the birth certificate. We are all broken hearted, but happy to know the truth has been revealed. yesssss I would recommend this Paternity test to anyone who has doubts.
customer_reviews.author: RhodesiaAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s not worth the paper it’s written on
customer_reviews.text: They stated results in 5 days still nothing and over a week we need to know who is the father as it’s crucial to her identity
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kirkley

customer_reviews.title: 100% actuate!!
customer_reviews.text: Went on ancestry DNA and found out that I am not scrub Nicaraguan and Puerto Rican. Then bought this product and did a DNA test with my step father and found out that not only is my step father my actual father but I am 100% Puerto Rican. Thanks! Love you guys!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and the online results showed up in about a week! The page was easy to get to and was thrilled with the results! Great kit. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like my results so I went and took one at a doctor office and the test results are accurate they where the same, so save your money unlike I did and ONLY use this one
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me, results about 5 days after it reached the lab in NY.
customer_reviews.author: Orville F. Otto

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It works, backed it up with expensive doctors test; same results.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Petrella

customer_reviews.title: Useful if you can get the samples you need
customer_reviews.text: Useful kit if you can get the affected parties to cooperate. If the mother refuses to participate (not allowing a swab of the child's mouth), does that suggest anything? So far, this kit has sat un-used because we can't get the sample we need. My advice: get consent from both parties before you spend money on this test. (Hopefully you find this tip helpful!)
customer_reviews.author: AKMonkeyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: STOP DONT BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a test for anyone who doig paternity for their child this is only for animals been there fone that lost a year off my daughters life and they do not give refunds and its hard to sue
customer_reviews.author: johnnie casey jr.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This test was used for the testing of a potential uncle for my grandson. The potential father was deceased. The accuracy of the test was amazing. It was simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied & recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Paternity Depot - Paternity Test kit with ALL lab fees included on May 1, 2018 after speaking with the customer service staff who were very compassionate and knowledgable. It arrived on time yesterday in discreet packaging. The test includes 4 swabs. The instructions are clear and the website is easy to navigate. I look forward to receiving the results!! This is an excellent value for the price. It includes the test kit plus the labs which may be used for legal purposes. The photos are of the kit I received. My personal information, mailing & test no. are concealed on purpose. I am extremely satisfied with this purchase & highly recommend this kit!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY,2 MONTHS AFTER & STILL WAITING ON RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: It says you would get results in 7days or less ,& is about to be 2 months & they " still waiting" on my results, & after emailing them they said ," oh in 3-7 days is after we get your results but coul take up to 15 days more, i call it bs,DONT GET IT, SPEND A LITTLE MORE BUT DONT GET THIS DNA TEST
customer_reviews.author: Adrian R.

customer_reviews.title: Do your research.
customer_reviews.text: Don't trust this test. It made me submit a star rating or else I wouldn't have gave it any stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommend this product - I sent the results out in the mail on March 26th they received them on April 3, started testin on April 4th had results in April 6th, they list daily the process - the hardest part was waiting for them to receive the samples
customer_reviews.author: Maria Fabrizio

customer_reviews.title: 30 days and no results
customer_reviews.text: Purchased over a month ago, sent swabs back with delivery confirmation and a month after they received swabs still no results! Will update if status changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it is a scam
customer_reviews.text: It tells you to access their website, but it is down. A big scam. No results. On the website it says not to call, there is no number, RED FLAG !!!! Get a different kits I am out my money. I wouldn't trust results were legit even if I get them. Still waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Pick a different company
customer_reviews.text: Terrible experience thus far. The assigned case number and pin had already been issued and used, once they did acknowledge getting the test they assigned a new number but that took over a week. We’re wrapping up week 3 now and still no results.
customer_reviews.author: JeskaJaymz

customer_reviews.title: Was okay
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really like the process but got the job done . Dont know if their system is back working properly but I had wait to be notified by email wasn't able to go online to get info.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and easy to mail off. Results came within the time said.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Espy

customer_reviews.title: Simple steps. Quick results.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine. Changed the way you receive results. They now email you with their findings, instead of looking it up on their website, but results were within a week. Provided all the information we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Layne Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great experience. Not the answer we wanted but it was true and accurate. Results will be taken by child support. It was very fast and the price is the price for the test no extra money for labs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Doty

customer_reviews.title: 4 days to results
customer_reviews.text: Express shipped to lab one day shipping. Only 4 days until we knew results. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reesor

customer_reviews.title: Like a previous customer said it was very simple just ...
customer_reviews.text: Like a previous customer said it was very simple just follow the directions and go from there. Make sure to register it first tho we didn't read the instructions thoroughly and it delayed toe response time but it was well worth it and simple to complete!!
customer_reviews.author: Fallon Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!! The instructions were super easy and we get the results back faster than we expected
customer_reviews.author: shinece b.

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it.
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with the wait time. It took forever and the website they give you ,to go on was useless. The results come through email after bugging them for a month!
customer_reviews.author: matthew davis hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this thing.. i did not get results for maybe 5 months and the only reason I finally did receive results was because I emailed them asking for results or a refund... DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU NEED FAST AND OR TIMELY RESULTS
customer_reviews.author: nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!, test came back with no results and ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! , test came back with no results and to resubmit new swabs. Followed directions perfectly for them to say no DNA found. Fake!
customer_reviews.author: Marie J.

customer_reviews.title: Our dna test determines I’m NOT the father 😝
customer_reviews.text: I’m not the daddy so it’s aces in my book
customer_reviews.author: Wade W Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Online results in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Seems legit. Got my results about 2 weeks after mailing it off. I checked the results online and was able to download a printable copy on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: K Dove

customer_reviews.title: this is crap !!!
customer_reviews.text: it says results are guarantee be back within 5 to 7 business days and I'm still waiting on my results and it's been 2 weeks already aweful to good to be true!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angella

customer_reviews.title: Longer than 5 days
customer_reviews.text: The packaging says results within 5 days... False advertising for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Was not as stated!!!
customer_reviews.text: It has been over a month and no results. Website just says awaiting samples. I would not advise anyone to buy this
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Watson

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest I've seen and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because it was so cheap compared to other tests out there. Fast results. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mirey

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to use and do
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use and do , instructions were easy to understand . It did take the 2 weeks that it said it would .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Easy to perform the test however the results take a long time to come back. Very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Results back in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: Just got the results and it even gives you a percentage. Would recommend it to others if need something like this.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mailed the swabs on Monday and received the results via email the following Tuesday.

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and easy!
customer_reviews.text: They were Uber fast with the results and easy to read the instructions.

customer_reviews.title: Results did not come back in 5 days I still have yet to see them
customer_reviews.text: Results did not come like they said in 5 days. It's been 2 weeks and still no results. No number to call or contact anyone. I'm extremely disappointed

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: It takes a few more days then it says but its understandable it's a ligit test
customer_reviews.author: shayla P.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate efficient and quick
customer_reviews.text: Love the response I got my results back in 5 days very accurate actually help find my real father
customer_reviews.author: Tameka78

customer_reviews.title: test easy to
customer_reviews.text: definitely stuck to the time table given. updates on processing given almost daily as it moved through the processing stage. test easy to reead
customer_reviews.author: juschelle15

customer_reviews.title: Only came with one swab, case ID number on ...
customer_reviews.text: Only came with one swab, case ID number on the card was completely ripped off, and there where no envelopes to return the specimen as indicated. Very disappointing. I will be returning for full refund and I will not choose this company. The contents look very cheap and documents are very crude and unprofessional. Don't trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Gave us the results we needed. Easy to use. Fast processing.
customer_reviews.author: Cvhess

customer_reviews.title: Playing with emotions
customer_reviews.text: I got the product and executed the instructions to the letter. But once I mailed it off, I found out that the business was closed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Price

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap and easy to do! The reason why I did not give 5 stars was because it took longer than the 7 days but it was worth the wait 😍 It my babe!

customer_reviews.title: Results
customer_reviews.text: I have lost my card with my number so I can get my results Who do I contact?

customer_reviews.title: Awful.. sent kit in says we have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful..sent kit in says we have to swab again its incomplete..very unsatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was Simple easy to use and got results fast

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: Told my son what he needed to know and at a very reasonable cost.

customer_reviews.title: The results are REAL!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe the results, confirmed through the state of Georgia child support office. GREAT price, real results!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, 2 week results
customer_reviews.text: Better than $200-400 to large companies. Results were delayed by 10 days.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned results in the promised time of 5 to 7 business days.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Mihalich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t the results we wanted but was glad to know 100%
customer_reviews.author: Durangoblond

customer_reviews.title: No no no
customer_reviews.text: I have not received my results in a month and there's no customer service to call very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STILL NO RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: GOING ON WEEK THREE AND I HAVE NOT HEARD ANYTHING!
customer_reviews.author: T25

customer_reviews.title: Great product, confident results.
customer_reviews.text: I love the certainty of the product, the 99.99% accuracy is proof. I don't exactly agree with the results in 3-5 days it's takes about three business days from your samples to be delivered to the lab. Then about 5-7 days for the results to come back. However overall I would definitely recommend the very very affordable product. It's easy to do. I also had another test done in a lab and I was given the same results after 350 dollars compared to the 60 this product goes for.
customer_reviews.author: OgKiiire

customer_reviews.title: Quick results
customer_reviews.text: Second time I've used this company. First to prove my daughter as mine (after discovering their mom's chronic infidelity) and the second proved my dad, that didn't even know I existed until I found him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipment was awesome. It came 2 days before it was suppose ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was awesome. It came 2 days before it was suppose to come and product came perfect. Comes with instructions step by step to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Suarez

customer_reviews.title: NO RESULTS!
customer_reviews.text: Test came back inconclusive. Still no answers and a waste of time and $85
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful service. Easy instructions! Nothing difficult about it at all! Called a few days after I mailed the results just to confirm they received them, nice and friendly young lady confirmed and said results should be ready very shortly. And she was absolutely correct, the results were sent by email a few days after that! Thanks Paternity Depot! KUDOS to you guys! I would highly recommend this to anyone needing this sort of service.
customer_reviews.author: lystra ali

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't as quick in results as stated, took ...
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't as quick in results as stated, took about 10 business days.. bought two tests and only one was able to be read. In which I don't understand because both we submitted exactly the same. So therefore I paid for the price of two and only ended up with results for one!
customer_reviews.author: AmPm2018

customer_reviews.title: But I ordered it and followed the instructions which were very easy and simple
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews i was skeptical that this was a fraud. But I ordered it and followed the instructions which were very easy and simple. Just received results back today. Took about a week for them to email us. The only thing that seemed weird was the website they provided. It updated that they received the samples then went under construction for days. But then they emailed us so it was no use in checking it anymore
customer_reviews.author: Pree

customer_reviews.title: Bad product! Sent it same day I received it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bad product! Sent it same day I received it in the mail. and over a month later still haven't gotten my results.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Easy fast, affordable
customer_reviews.text: The entire process took less than 7 days, with the weekend included. Easy fast, affordable. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little bit slow was the test result but 100% good, personal company. I can recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emese Valik

customer_reviews.title: SCAM
customer_reviews.text: TOTAL SCAM! Research into Viaguard and Accu-Metrics. BUYER BEWARE. I want a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: My ex cheated with a dozen men in the last ...
customer_reviews.text: My ex cheated with a dozen men in the last yr we were together so it was worth the money for piece of mind
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Malone

customer_reviews.title: Buy other brand
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this crap it's been 4 weeks still find get my result save your money😠😠
customer_reviews.author: ti

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste ur money
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy this again or was a waste of time an money,
customer_reviews.author: marjory wise

customer_reviews.title: Likely a scam, go elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: This is likely a scam with the other 5 star reviews being completely fake. Google reviews on Paternity Depot ratings and you will see this is a bogus product. My experience was similar to those reviews; no real phone number, lost samples, and going on a month with no results. Spend more money for such an important service, other places have great ratings and cost just over $100
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 days to even acknowledge receivning test samples
customer_reviews.text: they received the test samples on 11-10 but did not acknowledge receiving the samples until 11-16. Guess it buys them an extra 5 days so they can claim to be faster than they actually are at running the tests. do they they not realize every package is trackable? Not very impressed so far
customer_reviews.author: Sean A. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: They were very easy to understand
customer_reviews.text: This test kit was received within a very few days after ordering it. Once the saliva samples and mouth swabs were collected, we sent them off to the lab immediately. The results were ready within just a few days. They were very easy to understand. Very pleased with this testing process. It was nice that one payment up front paid for the kit and the testing.
customer_reviews.author: Lanis Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Results were fast. Test was easy. Price was decent. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Public Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Change of opinion of this product. CHECK YOUR SPAM BOX
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say. Mailed test in over 8 weeks ago, I waited so long as the US government was shut down and assumed that mail would be super slow. I started checking 2 weeks ago (~15 Jan 2019) and got message their site was under construction. If that fact is true they need more experienced technician for site maintenance. UPDATE: After writing to them I got surprised, I found a reply within 3 days however it went to my spam box. Got the result that I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: PaulW

customer_reviews.title: This Is NOT a scam!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited! I was skeptical about this dna test because of the reviews but i am thrilled! My samples arrived in NY from ID on Jan 4th and I recieved the results today Jan 8th!!! Great company to work with, fast and easy to read results! They responded to my email within an hour of sending it and I am all around pleased with my experience! Will Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrsfuller

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL SCAM
customer_reviews.text: Am yet to receive results at first it said they had to do more testing now after sending second samples via certified mail they are yet to post any new results it has been 27 days I want my results I will change my review if my results are ever posted *update* after waiting for almost 3 months we have recieved nothing back yet and it's now well past the time to ask for a refund, do not waste your time or money
customer_reviews.author: EllieB90

customer_reviews.title: Fraud, stay away.
customer_reviews.text: I did the test, mailed it in. A few days later I went to their web site to look for results. They just said they have not received any specimen. There is no real service, one can just email, it all looks fishy and as others mentioned, it is not serious. The unique ID was hand written in a way that numbers were hard to read. All the warning sign of fraudulent scheme. I fell for it. Save yourself the grief.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend but a little slower than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Item received as described. Process was easy. Website was easy. Samples were processed twice to ensure accuracy. Cons: I was completely freaked out by simple misspellings on the enclosed literature. SALIVA is a word you’d expect to be spelled correctly on a DNA test. That was unnerving, it made me feel like maybe we had chosen poorly. Process was a little slower than advised. We completed on March 7th, it was received on March 10th, got results on March 23rd. I don’t mind the time frame, it just wasn’t as advertised. I would still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JMagouirk

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint was that the website to check for results was being updated and I had to actually wait for the results email. Which came in less than 2 weeks. I mailed it in on a Tuesday and exactly 2 Tuesday’s later I received the email w the results.
customer_reviews.author: Wendolyn Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Delayed time
customer_reviews.text: Dna takes about 2weeks overall was nervous but they kept me updated online recieved my results thru there website by downloading the results
customer_reviews.author: Ke Hil

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: I took the paternity test and it came back that I was NOT the father. I then went to the doctor and got an official court verified test and it came back I was the father of my child. This amazon test is a fraud and I wouldn’t buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal and fast !
customer_reviews.text: 99.99 percent this baby boy is mine ! Best news I have ever received thank you
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Tijuana

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Very easy directions to understand! Fast Shipping! Packaging was perfect, as always!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Reck

customer_reviews.title: Long wait times.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet. Been waiting a week so far for the results..
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Carr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Found out my 18 year old son was not the father.
customer_reviews.author: Dwyn Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Like the ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but I like that it's easy to use and fees are included.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got an email a couple weeks later with results because their website was down.
customer_reviews.author: robert hurd

customer_reviews.title: Great for when you need answers
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to answer questions that need to be answered. Worked great for my boyfriend. You can pay extra for results able to be entered in court.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: You are the father! Fast results and accuracy.
customer_reviews.text: I received the Paternity DNA test very fast. I did the mouth swap on both daddy and baby and sent it in the mail in the enclosed self addresses envelopes. Wasn’t the results I wanted but I got them within two weeks. I am a big sister once again. Thanks for the great service.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I got my results and I am satisfied with my purchase and the quality of the product and the timeline of the test results. Thanks for a great product and a timely answer to my DNA results.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bramham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be the most excellent way to find out. Highest rated lab in the country!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Klock

product_meta.title: Paternity Depot - Paternity Test kit with All lab fees Included
product_meta.description: Paternity Depot - Paternity Test kit with ALL lab fees included
feature_bullets: CERTIFIED LAB: Sold directly from an approved Laboratory.
LOWEST PRICE ONLINE: All labs costs are Included for 1 suspected father and 1 child
QUICK RESULTS: Results in 5-7 days or less upon receipt of samples
ONLINE RESULTS: You will be emailed an official report with your results
